names.pinyin: zhi zi sheng jiang chi tang
names.english: gardenia, fresh ginger and prepared soybean decoction
names.commonEnglish: Gardenia, Fresh Ginger and Prepared Soybean Decoction

actions: Clears Heat, reduces Fire and eliminates irritability.
With Dan Dou Chi, for insomnia and irritability from Deficiency due to Heat lingering in the chest.
Releases the Exterior, eliminates irritability, harmonizes the Middle Jiao and relieves stuffy sensations in the chest.
With Zhi Zi, for late-stage residual Heat trapped in the chest and diaphragm
Releases the Exterior, induces perspiration, disperses Cold, warms the Middle and stops vomiting.
Relieves congestion in the chest and epigastrium
syndromes: Qi Stage Heat lingering in the chest and muscles with vomiting
If, after diaphoresis, purgation or emesis, there is vomiting

symptoms: A stifling sensation in the chest
A general feeling of weakness and Deficiency
Hunger with no desire to eat
manifestations.pulse: Slightly rapid or Strong and floating at the distal position

contraindications: Use with caution for those with long-lasting Spleen Deficiency with loose stools
